newsitem.title: COLOMBIA: Colombian peso closes 4.6 lower at 1,016.55 to dlr.
newsitem.headline: Colombian peso closes 4.6 lower at 1,016.55 to dlr.

text.p: Colombia's peso closed 4.6 lower at 1,016.55 to the dollar in active trade on the country's interbank market, dealers said.
They said demand for dollars early in the session, mostly from the corporate sector, helped drive the local currency sharply lower. The peso traded in a 1,012.90 to 1,017.20 range.
"Generally speaking, there was good supply and demand from corporate sector clients," one dealer said. Dealers reported an above-average total of 451 trades worth $210 million.
